*0 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *30 bitter *0 sour }} '''Ganlon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 ripe [[Shuca]] on the field.
